repository-engine.name: Repository Engine
repository-engine.description: Fetches and evaluates GitHub repositories for business potential

agents.name: Repository Filter Agent
agents.description: Filters out repositories that don't have business potential

agents.name: Repository Rank Agent
agents.description: Scores repositories for business opportunity potential

idea-engine-opportunity.name: Idea Engine - Opportunity Generator
idea-engine-opportunity.description: Generates business opportunity summaries from repositories

agents.name: Tuner Agent
agents.description: Generates parameter configurations for opportunity generation

agents.name: Tuned Opportunity Agent
agents.description: Generates opportunity summaries with market validation

orchestrator.name: Opportunity Orchestrator
orchestrator.description: Coordinates the execution of agents in the opportunity generation workflow

idea-engine-generator.name: Idea Engine - Idea Generator
idea-engine-generator.description: Synthesizes opportunities into cohesive business ideas

agents.name: Idea Agent
agents.description: Synthesizes opportunities into a cohesive business idea

orchestrator.name: Idea Orchestrator
orchestrator.description: Coordinates the execution of the idea generation workflow
